snippet: David Carr and A. O. Scott reflect on the life of Roger Ebert, the brand he created and the effect he had on Mr. Scott’s beginnings as a film critic.
abstract: David Carr and A. O. Scott reflect on the life of Roger Ebert, the brand he created and the effect he had on Mr. Scott’s beginnings as a film critic.

headline.main: The Sweet Spot: Two Thumbs Up
